metadata.synopsis: A shar cultist speculates to himself about what is going to happen after Viconia's defeat.

0.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
0.text: What will come now, I wonder?
0.context: NodeContext: Speculating to self in the aftermath of a succesful coup launched against the Shar cult's former leader, Viconia.

1.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
1.text: Change will be unusual. This place has only ever known Mother Superior Viconia as leader...
1.context: NodeContext: Speculating to self in the aftermath of a succesful coup launched against the Shar cult's former leader, Viconia.

2.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
2.text: I chose the winning side. All will be well, I am sure.
2.context: NodeContext: Speculating to self in the aftermath of a succesful coup launched against the Shar cult's former leader, Viconia.

3.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
3.text: ...though, the title of Mother Superior has slipped from her grasp.
3.context: NodeContext: Speculating to self in the aftermath of a succesful coup launched against the Shar cult's former leader, Viconia.
